Very ************* *** helpful doctor  well explained condition and treatment 
Treatment is satisfactory

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I highly recommend Dr Neelkanth Dhamanskar. He did knee replacements for my mother and my aunt. And both times it was a very smooth approach. He is very calm, peaceful, and a passionate doctor. He answers all the queries with a proper explanation. Also suggests if any further treatment requires. His team is also very supportive.

tags: None
review: I had been to hospital and it was for hand wrist swelling related. Doctor was good in consulting me. I would like to recommend the doctor to many people. There was waiting time in the hospital. It was more than 30 minutes. Tablets were prescribed by the doctor. Doctor was friendly.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Very    responsible  and caring, understanding nature
May God shower him all blessings and happiness

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Doctor friendliness,
review: The wait time is too less and the doctor listens to the health problem patiently. It was totally worth the fees and I am satisfied with the treatment too.

tags: None
review:
I suffered Ankle sprain in July 2016 and visited a MS Ortho doctor in Lilavati Hospital but after 1-2 months also did not get much relief from the treatment.

That is when I went to Dr. Neelkanth Dhamnaskar and he asked me to do few test and then based on it, he recommended exercises and ankle brace which has helped me alot to recover from the pain and swelling.

I would recommend Dr. Neelkanth Dhamnaskar to anyone who suffers any ortho problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: *** ** **** *** *********** ****** ** ** ******** The waiting time to show report is also toooooo long.. It will take generally 5 min to check reports by doctor and give prescription but the waiting time is more then 2 hours so u just have to wait and wait and wait for 5 minute meeting.. Dr should look into this that patients get irritated if u don't think about them..

review: Doctor was friendly as well as assistant doctor, nicely explain about problems. Nice staff..no waiting time..
